org.apache.poi.util

Class LittleEndianInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • org.apache.poi.util.LittleEndianInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, LittleEndianInput
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChunkedCipherInputStream 

    public class LittleEndianInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
implements LittleEndianInput
    Wraps an InputStream providing LittleEndianInput

    This class does not buffer any input, so the stream read position maintained by this class is consistent with that of the inner stream.

    (打包提供LittleEndianInvestment的InputStream此类不缓冲任何输入，因此此类维护的流读取位置与内部流的位置一致。)

      get a float value, reads it in little endian format then converts the resulting revolting IEEE 754 (curse them) floating point number to a happy java float(获取一个浮点值，以小端格式读取它，然后将生成的令人反感的IEEE 754（诅咒他们）浮点数转换为一个快乐的Java浮点数)

      void readFully(byte[] buf, int off, int len) 
      int readInt() 
      long readLong() 
      void readPlain(byte[] buf, int off, int len)
      Usually acts the same as LittleEndianInput.readFully(byte[], int, int), but for an encrypted stream the raw (unencrypted) data is filled(通常作用与LittleEndianInvestment.readFully（byte[]，int，int）相同，但对于加密流，原始（未加密）数据将被填充)

      • readPlain

        public void readPlain(byte[] buf,
                      int off,
                      int len)
        Description copied from interface: LittleEndianInput
        Usually acts the same as LittleEndianInput.readFully(byte[], int, int), but for an encrypted stream the raw (unencrypted) data is filled(通常作用与LittleEndianInvestment.readFully（byte[]，int，int）相同，但对于加密流，原始（未加密）数据将被填充)
        Specified by:
        readPlain in interface LittleEndianInput(readPlain在接口LittleEndianInput中)
        Parameters:
        buf - the byte array to receive the bytes(buf -接收字节的字节数组)
        off - the start offset into the byte array(off -字节数组的开始偏差)
        len - the amount of bytes to fill(len -要填充的字节量)

      • skipFully

        public void skipFully(int len)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)
